personal.name: Chris Misztur
personal.title: President & Founder, Mr. IIoT
personal.tagline: We build Smart Factories. Real and Virtual.
personal.shortBio: With two decades of experience integrating business systems into manufacturing processes at a major automotive supplier, I combine technical expertise with a keen ability to identify inefficiencies within systems. My approach emphasizes continuous learning and practical application of innovative technologies.
personal.fullBio:
At Mr. IIoT, I am committed to leading the way in the realm of digital transformation, empowering businesses to thrive in today's fast-paced, technology-driven environment. With expertise in digital Industry 4.0 transformation services, I help organizations adapt to the latest advancements and capitalize on new opportunities.

My mission is to drive innovation through the seamless application of advanced IoT solutions, enabling businesses and manufacturers to unlock their full potential. By leveraging the connectivity and intelligence that IoT provides, I aim to revolutionize industrial processes, enhance productivity, and facilitate real-time data-driven decision-making.

I developed the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach to Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) implementation, which consists of five key stages: Connect, Collect, Combine, Compute, and Convey. This methodology transforms raw data into actionable knowledge, facilitating improved decision-making and operational efficiency in industrial settings.

services.title: Digital Industry 4.0
services.shortDesc: Transform your manufacturing operations with cutting-edge Industry 4.0 solutions.

services.title: Business System Integration
services.shortDesc: Seamlessly connect your operational technology with information technology systems.
services.fullDesc: We design custom business systems including EDI portals, SSCC traceability, and automated order processing. Our solutions integrate with ERP, WMS, and platforms like SPS Commerce—automating purchase orders, invoicing, and shipping notices. Weekly check-ins and 5-minute email response times.

services.title: Industrial Automation
services.shortDesc: Custom software and middleware to make your hardware run seamlessly.
services.fullDesc: We develop customized software, hardware, and middleware solutions tailored to your specific needs. Our middleware toolset connects diverse systems—from factory equipment to client databases—enabling devices like barcode scanners and printers to work together with your networks in real time.

services.title: SHARC IoT Adapter
services.shortDesc: Universal IoT sensor adapter with 5-minute installation that bridges existing machinery with the digital world.
services.fullDesc: The SHARC (Simple Hardware Adapter for Remote Communications) connects analog (0-10V, 4-20mA) and discrete (PNP, NPN) sensors using MQTT for data transmission. Powered via PoE or 24Vdc, it features 100 Mbit Ethernet, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth connectivity. Integrates with custom Grafana dashboards for real-time and historical machine analytics. Compatible with MTConnect, OPC-UA, and SparkplugB standards.

services.title: DIME Software Suite
services.shortDesc: Enterprise industrial connectivity platform with 40+ protocol connectors and AI-powered analytics.
services.fullDesc: Data In Motion Enterprise (DIME) provides universal industrial connectivity with 40+ native protocol connectors including OPC-UA, Modbus, Ethernet/IP, MTConnect, and MQTT/SparkplugB. Features real-time streaming with millisecond latency, AI-generated configurations from natural language, Wireshark-like data visibility, and neuromorphic continuous learning for anomaly detection.

process.title: Discovery
process.fullDesc: We begin by thoroughly understanding your current manufacturing operations, pain points, and goals. This includes site visits, stakeholder interviews, and assessment of existing systems.

process.fullDesc: Based on discovery findings, we design a tailored IIoT architecture that integrates with your existing systems while positioning you for future growth. We select the right sensors, connectivity, and platforms.

process.title: Deploy
process.fullDesc: Our team works hand-in-hand with your IT/OT personnel to implement the solution. We handle hardware installation, software configuration, and system integration while minimizing disruption to operations.

process.title: Deliver
process.fullDesc: We ensure your team can fully leverage the new capabilities through comprehensive training. We provide ongoing support and optimization to help you continuously improve and expand your digital transformation.

problems.solution: Your machines, sensors, and business systems don't communicate, creating data silos and blind spots in your operations.
You're constantly fighting fires with unplanned downtime because you can't predict when equipment will fail.
Your team spends hours manually collecting and entering data that could be captured automatically in real-time.
You don't have real-time insight into what's happening on your shop floor, making it hard to identify and address issues quickly.
Your current IT vendor struggles with industrial implementations, leaving you without the specialized IT/OT expertise needed to connect and validate your equipment data.
Your team lacks the specialized knowledge to bridge operational technology with information systems, requiring prolonged investment in training or outside expertise.
Many vendors offer one-size-fits-all products, but your unique equipment and processes require a customized, integrative approach with true Industry 4.0 expertise.
Your existing methods struggle to meet FDA, customer, or industry traceability requirements, putting compliance and customer relationships at risk.
Your specialized devices, hardware, and software don't communicate with each other, requiring custom middleware to bridge the gaps and create a single working platform.
Your team spends hours manually entering customer orders into your ERP, creating delays, errors, and inefficiency that automated EDI integration can eliminate entirely.
